title: Polish Player Dashboard hero section
description: Update the Player Dashboard hero section to match the premium design established in the Coach Dashboard. Add gradient background, glass card effect, and proper spacing.
acceptance_criteria: Hero has gradient background similar to coach dashboard
Name, position, grad year, location prominently displayed
Edit Profile and Share Profile buttons present

title: Add Player Dashboard stat cards
description: Add the 'At a Glance' insight row with 3-4 stat cards: Profile Views, College Interest, Watchlist Adds. Use GlassCard component.
acceptance_criteria: Each card shows metric value and trend
Mobile: cards stack or scroll horizontally

title: Player Profile public view mode
description: Create a public-facing view of the player profile that coaches can see. Should show stats, videos, and contact info without edit controls.

title: Player Team Hub component
description: Create the Team Hub module showing Messages and Schedule tabs with recent conversations and upcoming events.
acceptance_criteria: Team Hub card with tabs: Messages | Schedule
CTA buttons to open full views

title: Player College Journey component
description: Create the College Journey module showing recruiting progress with Matches, Favorites, and Interested In Me sections.
acceptance_criteria: College Journey card with segmented control

title: Player Dashboard data fetching
description: Wire up real data fetching for player dashboard: profile views, college interests, watchlist counts from Supabase.

title: Player video upload functionality
description: Implement video upload to Supabase storage with thumbnail generation and display in player profile.
acceptance_criteria: Video appears in profile after upload

title: Player stats and measurables display
description: Polish the stats/measurables section with proper formatting, units, and D1-level badges where applicable.
acceptance_criteria: 60-yard time, Exit velo, FB velo, Pop time

title: Player messaging with coaches
description: Enable real-time messaging between players and coaches using Supabase realtime subscriptions.

title: Player Discover page polish
description: Update Player Discover page with glass UI components and proper filtering for finding colleges.

title: Fix TypeScript errors in discover page
description: Fix any TypeScript errors related to filter state handling in the discover page.

title: High School coach dashboard
description: Create the High School coach dashboard following the college coach pattern but tailored for HS coaches.

title: Showcase coach dashboard
description: Create the Showcase coach dashboard for travel team coaches.

title: JUCO coach dashboard
description: Create the JUCO coach dashboard with transfer portal focus.

title: Email notifications for messages
description: Set up email notifications when users receive new messages.

title: Implement image lazy loading
description: Add lazy loading for all images (avatars, logos, gallery) to improve page load performance.

title: Dark mode support
description: Ensure all components support dark mode using the existing theme context.
acceptance_criteria: All pages render correctly in dark mode

title: Extract common card patterns
description: Create reusable card components for stats, activities, and summaries used across dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Used in coach and player dashboards

title: Export player profile to PDF
description: Allow players to export their profile as a PDF for sharing with coaches.

title: Player engagement analytics
description: Track and display player profile engagement: views, time spent, coach interactions.

title: Fix calendar event modal date handling
description: Fix issue where calendar event dates may not be saved correctly in different timezones.

title: Add loading skeletons to dashboard
description: Replace loading spinners with skeleton loaders for better perceived performance.

title: Camp registration workflow
description: Allow players to register interest in camps, and coaches to manage registrations.

title: Animated page transitions
description: Add smooth page transitions using Framer Motion for a more polished feel.

title: Twitter/X social card preview
description: Add proper Open Graph and Twitter card meta tags for shared links.

title: Fix recruiting planner hover tooltips
description: Ensure player hover tooltips in the recruiting diamond don't get cut off at edges.

title: Bulk actions in watchlist
description: Allow coaches to select multiple players and perform bulk actions (move status, export, message).

title: Empty states for all sections
description: Add friendly empty states with illustrations and CTAs for all empty lists.

title: Implement pagination for player lists
description: Add pagination or infinite scroll to player search results to handle large result sets.

title: Supabase realtime for notifications
description: Set up realtime subscriptions for in-app notifications (new message, profile view, etc).
